FuncDef: The reset traffic-statistics hard-pipe vsi command clears all PW hard pipe traffic statistics in a specified VSI.
CLIs: reset traffic-statistics hard-pipe vsi <vsi-name> [ peer <peer-ip> [ negotiation-vc-id <pw-id> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a peer IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a PW ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies a VSI name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset traffic-statistics hard-pipe vsi vsi1 peer 2.2.2.2 negotiation-vc-id 12
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear all PW hard pipe traffic statistics in a specified VSI, run the reset traffic-statistics hard-pipe vsi command. If you specify peer, hard pipe traffic statistics of a specified PW are cleared.
